thread.title: My 6th visit! Wouldn't miss it!
thread.title_full: My 6th visit! Wouldn't miss it! - Review of Hotel de l'Academie, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Catherine C
title: My 6th visit! Wouldn't miss it!
text: Paris would just not be Paris without his beautiful hotel in the most central district bring St Germaine, and The super efficient and friendly ladies and gent at reception. It is a home away from home. Now a 4 Star hotel it has a little extra in terms of gowns and slippers. Always had breakfast, free wifi. Well done for the wonderful ambience.
